title: Amount spent on smartphone accessories by U.S. consumers 2010
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Responses on X-axis for 4 groups Under $50, $50 - $100, $100 - $200, and $200 and up. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Response Android owners had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 4 groups, and it was for Under $50. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Response BlackBerry owners for $200 and up.
In Response iPhone owners, $100 - $200 had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Response Android owners out of all 3 Responses.
The maximum SOME LABEL for $100 - $200 that was found in Response iPhone owners was 2.38 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Response Android owners.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Responses on X-axis for 4 groups Under $50, $50 - $100, $100 - $200, and $200 and up. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Out of all 4 groups, Under $50 had the highest SOME LABEL in Response Android owners and $200 and up had the lowest SOME LABEL in Response BlackBerry owners.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Responses on X-axis for 4 groups Under $50, $50 - $100, $100 - $200, and $200 and up. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Response Android owners had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 4 groups, and it was for Under $50. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Response BlackBerry owners for $200 and up.
In Response iPhone owners, $100 - $200 had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Response Android owners out of all 3 Responses.
The maximum SOME LABEL for $100 - $200 that was found in Response iPhone owners was 2.38 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Response Android owners.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Responses on X-axis for 4 groups Under $50, $50 - $100, $100 - $200, and $200 and up. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Response Android owners had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 4 groups, and it was for Under $50. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Response BlackBerry owners for $200 and up.
Among all the Responses, $100 - $200 had the highest SOME LABEL 19.0 in Response iPhone owners and lowest value 8.0 in Response Android owners.
Response iPhone owners and Android owners had the biggest gap of 11.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for $100 - $200.
Among the groups, Under $50 had the biggest difference in SOME LABEL. Where the maximum SOME LABEL was 1.82 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL.

In Response Android owners, Under $50 had the highest SOME LABEL 60.0 among the 4 groups and in BlackBerry owners, $200 and up had the lowest SOME LABEL 1.0. The second highest SOME LABEL 19.0 was observed for Under $50 in Response Android owners.
Averaging all 4 groups Under $50, $50 - $100, $100 - $200, and $200 and up, the Response BlackBerry owners is the maximum SOME LABEL and Android owners is the minimum SOME LABEL.
